title: Redwood National and State Parks: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit            Current Conditions  Redwood National and State Parks are wild and ever-changing—knowing the current conditions will help to ensure a more enjoyable redwood adventure. More...           Visitor Centers  A great start! An essential stop. Visit one of the parks' five visitor centers. More...           Backcountry Hiking Spending a few hours, or a few days in the backcountry needs good preparation. We have hundreds of miles of trails to explore. More...           Camping  Whether you prefer the comfort of a developed campground or the solitude of a backcountry camp, world-class camping opportunities abound at Redwood National & State Parks. More...           The 2016 Visitor Guide  A detailed read that aims to answer all of your redwood questions. It includes the most up-to-date park information, maps, and articles from park rangers. More »
